materials.raw_text:
Cs2O: 400 g 
 Ru: 10 g

sourcing.instructions:

 Ru: Purchase from a reputable metal supplier or online marketplaces. 
 Te: Acquire from chemical supply companies or online vendors.

preparation.raw_text:
